top_convergence_opportunities.description:
========================================
Was this you?
========================================

Hi Michael,

Security alert: login with a code

Hi Michael,

Someone just used the email address mataluni@me.com and a code to log into your Facebook account. We're getting in touch because this could be a sign that someone is trying to hack your account. If this wasn't you, we're here to help you take some simple steps to secure your account.

Thanks,
The Facebook team

top_convergence_opportunities.title: Bring back liberal nationalism
top_convergence_opportunities.description:
View this post on the web at https://www.noahpinion.blog/p/bring-back-liberal-nationalism

The Trump administration is not doing a good job. Tariffs are punishing the U.S. economy. Masked federal agents are rampaging through the streets of American cities, grabbing people off the street. Corruption is rampant. The people Trump put in charge of the country’s public health services don’t even believe in the germ theory of disease [ https://substack.com/redirect/79ec9941-49e4-4cbf-8551-435a90238ffc

top_emergence_opportunities.title: I want the Japanese future back!
top_emergence_opportunities.description:
View this post on the web at https://www.noahpinion.blog/p/i-want-the-japanese-future-back

My first book, Weeb Economy [ https://substack.com/redirect/097eca29-15a8-45de-ab01-074ba534f716?j=eyJ1IjoiY2pkcnIifQ.Gnnj2m3PElcti0jC4CDduTX5CXJTYdXAA2I7EnfiuLQ ], came out in March of this year, but only in Japanese. Since then, a bunch of people have been asking me for an English translation.
Half of the book was a series of translated posts [ https://substack.com/redirect/097eca29-15a8-45de-ab01-074ba
action_items: The other half was a new part that I wrote in English and had translated into Japanese by my excellent translator, Kataoka Hirohito

In this first installment, I discuss:
Why 2008 was a pivotal turning point for the Japanese economy (and not in a good way)
Why economic stagnation actually presents Japan with a golden opportunity
Wh

top_emergence_opportunities.title: Recommendations from your Substacks
Should we worry about AI's circular deals?
top_emergence_opportunities.description:
View this post on the web at https://www.noahpinion.blog/p/should-we-worry-about-ais-circular

A week ago, I wrote a post about the possibility of a bust in the AI sector:
One aspect of the story I didn’t talk about was the web of “circular” deals between AI model makers, compute providers, and chipmakers. Almost every news story or blog post that worries about the threat of an AI bust mentions these. Here are some excerpts from a good overview of the situation [ https://substack.com/redirect/fe
action_items: Almost every news story or blog post that worries about the threat of an AI bust mentions these

top_emergence_opportunities.title: The Great World War 2 Afterparty is over
top_emergence_opportunities.description:
View this post on the web at https://www.noahpinion.blog/p/the-great-world-war-2-afterparty

My father’s father was a bombardier in Europe in World War 2. Around Christmas in 2002, I asked him to tell me everything he remembered about the war. I had always had great reverence for my grandparents’ generation, and growing up I pestered them for as many of their stories as they could tell me. But the war, and especially combat itself, had been the one thing I avoided asking about directly; instead,
action_items: The one line my grandfather repeated, over and over, was “For all we knew, we were going to die the next day
In 1932, there had never been an economic downturn like the Great Depression; nobody knew whether capitalism was permanently collapsing, but they kept on going to work every day

In 1942 nobody knew whether the Nazi and Japanese empires would conquer Eurasia, enslave its people, and use its vast resources to cow the United States into submission — but they didn’t flinch from t

Hi Michael,

I just got off a call with a DTC agency owner who said something we’re all thinking:

“The next three weeks are going to be multiple months of work compressed into a short window.

We’re a small team, everyone’s stretched thin, and our spend has to go farther.”

That’s the season we’re in:

Limited bandwidth, limited budget, and ads getting more expensive by the day.

CPMs on M

The Trump administration is not doing a good job. Tariffs are punishing the U.S. economy. Masked federal agents are rampaging through the streets of American cities, grabbing people off the street. Corruption is rampant. all_opportunities.title: Mamdani's biggest challenges
all_opportunities.description:
View this post on the web at https://www.noahpinion.blog/p/zohrans-real-problems-arent-what

As expected, Zohran Mamdani has won the New York City mayoral election. Most of the commentary about Mamdani has centered around either his Muslim religion, his leftist ideology, or some intersection of the two. This is only to be expected. The GOP electoral victory in 2024 left the Democratic party without any obvious leader, and Mamdani is a charismatic guy who ran a slick, competent campaign and inspi
